name: Read Binary File
semantic_context: Reads a binary file from disk
natural_language_description: 这是 Read Binary File 节点。主要用于: Reads a binary file from disk

filePath.name: filePath
filePath.description: Path of the file to read
filePath.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Path | 作用: Path of the file to read | (必填项)

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read file
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read file | 默认值: data | (必填项)
